typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		EMPNO as string,
		ENAME as string,
		JOB as string,
		MGR as string,
		HIREDATE as string,
		SAL as string,
		COMM as string,
		DEPTNO as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> EMPSRC
EMPSRC split(DEPTNO=='10',
	DEPTNO=='20',
	DEPTNO=='30',
	disjoint: false) ~> ConditionalSplit1@(DEPTNO10, DEPTNO20, DEPTNO30, DEPTNO80)
ConditionalSplit1@DEPTNO10 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['target10.csv'],
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> target10
ConditionalSplit1@DEPTNO20 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['target20.csv'],
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> target20
ConditionalSplit1@DEPTNO30 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['target30.csv'],
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink1
ConditionalSplit1@DEPTNO80 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['target80.csv'],
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink2
